N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2608.1 - Reapplication submission requirements

State Regulations
(a) A neighborhood preservation company's
contract may be renewed or extended from year to year, based on contractual
performance. (b) The applicant must
complete such forms and attachments as prescribed by the division. (c) Essential components of the reapplication
include: (1)
recertification of
eligibility; (2)
quantified, measurable objectives to be accomplished by the completion of the activities
proposed in the work plan; (3)
proposed budget for the coming contract year; and
(4)
evidence of the required one-third
match; (d) Required
documents. The following documents shall be submitted prior to review of the
reapplication: (1)
annual certified audit for
last completed fiscal year; (2)
annual program and fiscal reports for the last completed contract; and
(3)
quarterly program and
financial reports for the second quarter. Notes
